full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## SSC 2BP3-125328 - Production Printers for National Research Council Canada

### Overview

* Solicitation Number: BPM019466/23695
* Reference Number: SSC-23-00023695
* Status: Expired

### Procurement Details

* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Trade Agreements: CCC, CUSTCPF, TPPTPP, AUCFTA, CCHFTAVALPTEUATEPACTAAAEMMTTCS
* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region

### Description

National Research Council Canada has a requirement for production printers to lease for 60 months, with an option to renew for two 12-month periods. The Contract includes the supply, delivery, and installation of equipment, as well as necessary training in English.

### Key Requirements

* Supply of three (3) black-and-white production printers and one (1) color production printer
* Delivery and installation of equipment
* Necessary training in English
* 60-month lease, with option to renew for two 12-month periods

### Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* Contact Name: Jesse Squirrell
* Email: jesse.squirrell@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* Phone: 613.791.6257
* Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON K2P 2H8
